title: About 'Forecast Janna'...
body:
Every-time I do _/joke_, I get both voices from the skin and the classic. That was all...


I don't know how to end this...

replies.body: Thanks for the report! This should be resolved in 6.9. We are still working on audio theft if there is another Janna on the enemy team, but if you only have Forecast Janna in a game, it's fixed! :)
